description:
Run AI models locally. One-click install w/ zero configuration.


- Improvements
  - Added copy message button to right click menu
  - Lowered swipe sensitivity for regenerating responses on mobile
  - Cleaned up chat background images on Desktop
- Bug fixes
  - Fixed issue with stop locking chat actions until after page refresh
  - Fixed delays when clicking stop button on Android
  - Fixed issue with chat messages disappearing until after page refresh
  - Fixed issue with chat messages being cut off at the bottom on Android
  - Fixed issue causing chat message to be uneditable on mobile
  - Fixed chat deletions failing silently
  - Fixed account deletion
